summary: A cop, a lawyer, and an assassin cross paths after the murder of a federal witness and the kidnapping of a famous pop star.
cast: Aaron Kwok|Ekin Cheng|Daniel Wu|Angelica Lee|Jing Ning|Jan Lamb|Rongguang Yu|Gallen Lo|Tommy Yuen|Samuel Pang|Suet-Fei Chiu|Eric Tsang|Sam Lee|Suet Lam|Tak-Bun Wong|Anson Leung|Tony Ho|Siu-Ming Lau|Agnes Pang|Phoebe Fung|Ka-Fuen Ip|Chun Wing|Patrick Chow|Eric Tin Cheung Li|Wai-Kin Chan|Chi-Kui Fong|Kate Tsim|Shirley Chui|Kin-Tong Chiu|Kwun-Hang Tang|Jerry Leung|Ricky Hui|Ping-Lok Wong|Martin Ma|Ming-Fai Sheung|Guthrie Yip|Johnnie Guy|Crystal Kwok|Man-Lok Kwok|Long-Ki Wong|Man Shing Yau|Wah Cheung|Ada|Wong Yin Keung|Moon-Yuen Cheung|Pan Mai Ming|Bobby Fok|King-Man Yip|Patel Nimisha|Mahesh Sahni|Neemisha|H. title: Divergence
